[cluster_agent_settings_changed]
update_agents = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:update_agents

[cluster_db_status_changed]
choose_new_master = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:choose_new_master

[cluster_manager_services_changed]
choose_new_master = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:choose_new_master

[cluster_master_changed]
follow_master_db = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:follow_master_db
stop_master_services = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:stop_master_services
update_agents = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:update_agents

[cluster_next_master_changed]
promote_master_db = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:promote_master_db
start_master_services = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:start_master_services

[cluster_nodes_changed]
disable_consul_bootstrap = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:disable_consul_bootstrap
disconnect_from_cluster = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:disconnect_from_cluster
remove_consul_block = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:remove_consul_block
update_db_settings = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:update_db_settings

[cluster_syncthing_changed]
update_syncthing_config = cloudify_premium.ha.handlers:update_syncthing_config

[console_scripts]
check_runner = cloudify_premium.ha.checks:check_runner
consul_watcher = cloudify_premium.ha.commands:consul_watcher
create_cluster_node = cloudify_premium.ha.commands:create_cluster_node
handler_runner = cloudify_premium.ha.watch_handlers:handler_runner
recovery_watcher = cloudify_premium.ha.commands:recovery_watcher
